7BARSAMPLER.reviewDescription: I only tried the matcha and the banana flavor so far but I am very pleased with the texture and tastes! They are a great snack size and have amazing flavor. BIG FAN!!!

7BARSAMPLER.reviewTitle: Sooo delicious!! Great on the go with my keto diet.
7BARSAMPLER.reviewDescription: Love them so far. Very delicious abs a great snack on my keto diet. Will order more.

7BARSAMPLER.reviewTitle: Good and healthy nutritional balance my new go-to meal replacement bar
7BARSAMPLER.reviewDescription: I like the ingredients and the nutritional balance provided by this bar. I purchased the sampler pack for my first purchase of this brand and so far have found the taste and texture of all flavors to be good. I frequently eat protein / lunch bars as meal replacements so I try to have several different brands to get some diversity in my intake. This is definitely part of my lineup for future!
These bars fit my keto plan and are really tasty! I love the texture and they are filling as well!

10850004554099.reviewDescription: I got the sampler pack to see which flavors I liked best. I ended up repurchasing the chocolate sea salt and banana nut. Both are SERIOUSLY so good! I love how subtly sweet they are, the soft texture, and the quality ingredients. Thank you IQbar!

I started with a sampler box. While all of them were decent, I loved the Almond, Peanut, Chocolate and Lemon Blueberry. Wasn't crazy about the Blueberry or the Matcha. But the calorie content, texture, flavor, macros and limited, nutritious ingredients in combination, make these outstanding bars! I have tried lots of bars.....most of the ones that taste good have over 200 calories. Limited calorie and ingredient ones also have limited or chemical lavor profile or are hard as a rock. These are a great balance of everything without giving up anything. I will continue to stock these bars, and only these bars.

850004554371.reviewTitle: Never get tired of them! I’ve tried them all (well, most all), and this is THE best keto protein bar out there.
850004554371.reviewDescription: I’ve been eating clean for a while now, and always trying new protein, low-carb, healthy bars. Found these at Sprouts one day, thought, “Hey, these are good” and ordered the sampler. I settled on the three ‘chocolate lovers’ flavors as my all-time faves, and never get tired of them. I’m on my second 72-bar case now, and they are my go-to healthy snack every day.           Keep up the good work!
I LOVE these bars....filling, delicious & guilt free. Would love some more chocolate flavors please!!!!

The worst thing about these bars is that they are so good that I don't want to eat anything else. I don't have that kind of money, you know? Plus I'm kinda cheap. But I set up my first automatic subscription ever... and it's for these bars. I need them in my life. They are worth every penny. I'm not keto but I am vegan and they're the best vegan bars I've ever had. Not even the best protein bar, just the best bar of any sort.
good for on the go snack

This product is healthy enough to eat in bulk. So just in case I can't balance my gluttony I don't feel terrible afterwards. Overall my hunger has reduced I do feel like I can think more clear and these little buggers are handy and quick.

850004554388.reviewDescription: I've tried all 3 fruit flavors and they are great! Satisfying, so fresh, no cloying sweetness, no artificial aftertaste, and I prefer pea protein to whey protein. Can't wait for you to add another fruitflavor (strawberry or raspberry please)!

850004554388.reviewTitle: Need to be in all stores
850004554388.reviewDescription: I went to my local grocery stores in search of a good protein bar. I couldn't find any i liked from what i can read on the packaging. I found these on amazon and I went all in and purchased a big box of the chocolate lovers and they didn't disappoint. Each one tastes amazing other bars have some sort of bad taste i cant put words for but these are just amazing. Good job to IQBAR

850004554296.reviewDescription: Satisfies a snack craving without sugar alcohols! Definitely reccomend
These are perfect as a healthy mid-day snack. Nutrient-dense filling no crap highly recommended.

850004554296.reviewTitle: The Best Protein Bars on the Market - No Joke!
850004554296.reviewDescription: I want to say that I'm definitely not a paid rep or sponsor that said I've been getting these bars for a while now and they are absolutely incredible. The fact that they are vegan kosher etc. and the lowest protein bars in sugar that you'll find is one thing but the fact that they taste amazing is another equally motivating factor! I would try the fruit variety and the chocolate variety pack to start because there are some gems there and you can find your favorites. Seriously if you're looking for a healthier protein bar and a more satisfying one than you found anywhere else just buy them. You won't regret it.
Love that the bars are soft , chewy, sweet, salty with a little bit of crunch. The chocolate ones are delicious!!

850004554104.reviewTitle: Great Pickmeup and Pre/Post Workout excellent customer service
850004554104.reviewDescription:
I had a great experience! My wife ordered me a chocolate lovers variety pack for Christmas. I enjoyed all the flavors! After I finished the first 12 I went online and ordered 36 more. The order process was quick and easy. I received several emails confirming my order and even an email with tracking information so I knew exactly when my order should arrive (good to know so the package does not sit on the porch and freeze). I pack a bar in my lunchbox so I have one available whenever I need a pickmeup. They are also great for a pre or post workout. I will definitely keep a full stock of IQBAR's in my cupboard!
Thank you,
Mike

850004554104.reviewTitle: Great Pickmeup and Pre/Post Workout - Excellent Customer Service!
850004554104.reviewDescription:
I had a great experience! My wife ordered me a chocolate lovers variety pack for Christmas. I enjoyed all the flavors! After I finished the first 12 I went online and ordered 36 more. The order process was quick and easy. I received several emails confirming my order and even an email with tracking information so I knew exactly when my order should arrive (good to know so the package does not sit on the porch and freeze). I pack a bar in my lunchbox so I have one available whenever I need a pickmeup. They are also great for a pre or post workout. I will definitely keep a full stock of IQBAR's in my cupboard!
Thank you,
Mike
We love these bars! They are a great healthy snack and so full of flavor.
I love these bars so much! Low in calorie and are good for my sensitive stomach!

850004554104.reviewTitle: Great grab and go for post bariatric surgery!
850004554104.reviewDescription: Low calorie high protein and tasty. I will continue to order these.

850004554135.reviewDescription: IQ bars are so good and affordable. Banana nut is my fave. It tastes just like Banana Nut Bread! Will def be purchasing again!
I love the taste of these bars and they keep me full for a long time so I don’t have the urge to eat a lot of calories

850004554135.reviewTitle: A great solution for low carb snacking or meal supplements
850004554135.reviewDescription: Having been low carb for over 2 years, I've tried more brands or snack/meal/supplement bars than I can remember, and they all leave something to be desired. Having stated that, these rank among the best. The ingredients are good (sodium is a little high), taste is good, texture is great (especially if you let them get a little warm.) Love the variety of flavors..banana nut is one of my favorites
I love these bars so much! Low in calorie and are good for my sensitive stomach!
I love these bars, they're not too dry and the flavors are great! It's nice to have a protein bar that's not chocolate or vanilla.

850004554074.reviewDescription: Great nutrition bars with a really good taste!
I love the clean ingredients and low calories in a healthy bar!
I love the clean ingredients and low calories for a delicious healthy bar!
I love these bars! They are super filling and my favorite go to snack!
These bars are absolutely amazing and give me so much energy, the lemon blueberry is my favorite!

850004554050.reviewDescription: Perfect macros, wonderful taste, and very fitting for an active lifestyle.

I work carpentry, and abide by a strict diet plan. These bars are very satisfying, with a consistency that matches or exceeds your favorite non-keto bars. Perfect macros as well, I highly recommend these in particular.

I have tried every flavor and love them all, with Banana Nut and Blueberry being my favorites! When I began a medically supervised eating program a couple of months ago, I was very happy when my nutritionist approved of them. I look forward to having one every day, as it’s my delicious treat that’s also good for me!
Very good for diet conscious person. Great taste

I’ve tried a lot of protein bars and they are all so chewy, dry and flavorless. I decided to give IQBAR a try and I’m so glad I did, they are delicious, good for you and taste super fresh. Love these and will definitely be getting more!

850004554067.reviewTitle: Even my 4yo grand daughter loves them
850004554067.reviewDescription: I especially enjoy the chocolate seasalt bar as does my granddaughter who is not a great eater but will eat one of these. I love all the flavors and Almond butter chip is a perfect filling snack/lunch with a cup of coffee.
I love these bars! The flavor is good, the ingredients are awesome and they’re only 4 points on Weight Watchers. Wholesome meal replacement for those on the go!

850004554081.reviewDescription: My wife and I started keto. And we where looking for a bar to eat to go with our coffee in the morning and hands down the bes

850004554081.reviewTitle: Such a great bar for protein and flavor!
850004554081.reviewDescription: Love the flavor on the Lemon Blueberry one! Filling for a quick breakfast in the morning!

Cons: 
Has superfoods packed in a tiny bar 
Only 150-160 cals 
Great for a fuelled and delicious breakfast (surprisingly filling and gives you that caffeine boost) 
Its been my breakfast fir a couple of weeks now with green tea 
Cons: 
Pricey (unless you get a deal, i usually goto sprouts and get a box of all 3 flavours). Almond one is my fav 
Tips: 
If you have an oatmeal with this microwaved on top for 15 seconds. Its bomb
These taste really good and are good for you. I love how soft they are and the flavor is delicious. Will definitely be ordering more !
Great flavor in a lower carbohydrate bar! Fantastic way to beat that midday slump and stay energized!

850004554098.reviewDescription: Delightful matcha chai tea flavored IQBars. Flavor is not overpowering; it's just right. Every time I have one, I like them even more. IQBars overall are the best you'll find.

It took me a long time to find a healthy bar that I actually love. All IQ Bar flavors fit the bill, but the matcha goes above and beyond. Hands down the best flavor ever! Does not taste artificial like so many other bars. Perfectly sweetened. 12/10!
Or whole family loves these bars. They're gluten and dairy free,and packed with great nutrition. Matcha, Choc Sea Salt and Peanut Butter Chip are sublime. Plus they are not too sweet- just right!

I’ve never had a better bar in my life, and I’ve tried them all. They are the perfect flavors, texture, softness, and of course the best ingredients. My 4 and 7 year old kiddos love them as well, they pick these bars over every other snack we have in the house.
The matcha taste is perfect -- not too strong, not too sweet. The bars are filling -- the perfect snack. And actually nutritious!

850004554197.reviewDescription: Absolutely live this bar keeps me full for hours definitely recommend
I still think lemon blueberry is my favorite but all these bars have great flavor, consistency, and energy after eating.
This is the best protein bar I have ever had.
Great flavors and not too sweet!!

850004554166.reviewDescription: Love chocolate but can’t have sugar
I like chocolate but can’t have a lot of sugar
These things are perfect. If you're like me and appreciate a low calorie, mid-protein, gluten free boost, these are the ones. Taste crazy good too.

850004554166.reviewTitle: These are my favorite granola bars ever!
850004554166.reviewDescription: Love these bars. Perfect amount of crunch and softness great flavor low sugar and VEGAN
They are not too sweet, and are super delicious. Love that they are low in net carbs.
